long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
To be used with https://songsweeper.herokuapp.com

You can use this extension to track a specific tab, once tracked, this extension will note every time the tab title changes. This is to be used for tracking audio metadata titles when listening to music on websites such as YouTube, Soundcloud, Spotify, and more. 

Once you track your music, you can delete plays from your history, and then send the data to your playlist database. Where you can view your listening history online and generate analytics (WIP).
